subject: Built another couple of 12-470 sound chamber systems
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Okay I put together another couple of sound chamber type Ghost Box 
systems today.  I now have Mike's Box 12.470 Proto 1, Mike's Box 
12.470  Prod 1, and Mike's Box 12.470 Prod 2.  The Prod 1 and Prod 2 
incorporate everything except the digital or analog recorder, which you 
must supply.  Each cost about $75 to build and each of the components 
is affixed to the case/chamber with velcro just like my prototype unit.
A few photos can be seen here:
http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=129

- Mike
-------------

All my Radio Shack Hack video can be found at:
http://www.ufogeek.com
